name: GetCountries
description: Get Countries will fetch and print countries in different computer friendly formats like xml, csv, yaml, json etc.

scripts.watch: watchify -t babelify js/app.js -o dist/app.js | cp node_modules/zeroclipboard/dist/ZeroClipboard.swf dist/ZeroClipboard.swf
scripts.build: browserify -t babelify js/app.js -o dist/app.js | cp node_modules/zeroclipboard/dist/ZeroClipboard.swf dist/ZeroClipboard.swf
scripts.test: npm run watch & watchify -t babelify test/all_spec.js -o dist/test.js & testem -f testem.json

author: Drazen Peric
